name: Quad Bike Race - Desert Offroad
description:
Experience what is it like to ride a quad bike desert off-road! Do you have what it takes to finish first in this exciting racing game? Its more exciting when you have some opponents who will cause you troubles on your way to the finish line. They can be better than you and this way you have to be fast and ambitious to win.

- stunning 3d graphics
- desert scene
- up to 5 opponents
- easy to play
